hero.description: We work for the sustainable development of civil society in Cristuru Secuiesc and the activation of community resources.

about.title: Who are we?
about.description: The 'O Șansă Pentru Comunitate' (A Chance for the Community) Association was founded in August 2021 in Cristuru Secuiesc, aiming to be a catalyst for local community development. We firmly believe that the strength of a community lies in its own resources.
about.history_text: Our association was established on August 27, 2021, by its founding members: Kovács Zsolt, Kerestély Attila, and Kovács Ioan. Since then, we have been dedicated to creating new opportunities for Cristuru Secuiesc and its surrounding regions.
about.mission_text: We pursue the sustainable development of the local community and support civil society efforts to stimulate community resources. We support progress from a socio-economic and cultural point of view, encouraging citizen participation in local development.
